markDown.title: Product branding
markDown.subtitle: Proper logo use helps Zywave maintain a strong brand identity. Consistency is key and these guidelines will help you determine the best way to use our logos.
markDown.content: ## Standard Zywave corporate logos The standard Zywave corporate logo should be used in most cases. The logo with a tagline is preferred over the one without. The Zycon is typically used as a subtle motif that reinforces our brand and should never be used in place of the Zywave logo. ![Zywave logo with tagline](/images/foundations/product-branding/logo-zywave-tagline.png) With tagline ![Zywave logo without tagline](/images/foundations/product-branding/logo-zywave.png) Without tagline ![Zycon](/images/foundations/product-branding/zycon.png) Zycon #### Download Zywave corporate logos Download PNG Download EPS ### Variations Grayscale and white logo variations are generally preferred. White logos should appear on a field of color. Typically this will be one of our standard grays or Zywave green. ![Grayscale Zywave logo](/images/foundations/product-branding/logo-zywave-tagline-grayscale.png) Grayscale ![White Zywave logo on gray background](/images/foundations/product-branding/logo-zywave-white-gray-bg.png) White on gray background ![White Zywave log on Zywave Green background](/images/foundations/product-branding/logo-zywave-white-green-bg.png) White on Zywave Green background ### Clear space Surround the Zywave logo with enough clear space so that it is clearly visible. This will maximize the recognition and impact of our identity. There are some instances—such as in our product headers—where including an ample amount of clear space is not necessary and can be omitted. ![White space around Zywave logo should be height of chevron](/images/foundations/product-branding/logo-zywave-clearspace.png) The Zywave chevron can be used to determine the appropriate amount of clearspace. ### Logo abuse It is extremely important to use our logo as described in these guidelines. Deviating from the prescribed usage compromizes the integrity of Zywave's brand. The examples shown here should be avoided at all costs. If you alter the Zywave logo in any way or attempt to squeeze it in somewhere, then you're probably doing it wrong. **Stop it!** ![Miscovered Zywave logo](/images/foundations/product-branding/logo-zywave-alterations-miscolored.png) Miscolored—this simply doesn't look good! ![Tilted Zywave logo](/images/foundations/product-branding/logo-zywave-alterations-skewed.png) Tilting our logo doesn't make it coool or fun. ![Too small Zywave logo](/images/foundations/product-branding/logo-zywave-alterations-small.png) This is too small. Every part of our logo should be legible. ![Squeezed Zywave logo](/images/foundations/product-branding/logo-zywave-alterations-squeezed.png) Squeezing the logo might make it fit in your powerpoint, but it doesn't fit with our brand. ![Pairing Zywave logo with Zycon](/images/foundations/product-branding/logo-zywave-alterations-zycon.png) Pairing the Zywave logo with the Zycon is unnecessary and muddies our brand. ![Zywave logo overlayed on busy image](/images/foundations/product-branding/logo-zywave-alterations-over-image.png) Putting our logo on top of an image hinders visibility and legibility. Don't do it!
